page.title: 09TOURISM
page.content: TOURISM IS AN IMPORTANT INDUSTRY IN THE AREA. THE OLD GWERNYFED MANOR HOUSE CATERS FOR THE MORE EXPENSIVE RANGE OF THE MARKET, OFFERING EXCELLENT FOOD, COMFORTABLE ACCOMODATION AND A WARM WELCOME TO A HISTORIC BUILDING SET IN BEAUTIFUL SCENERY AT THE FOOTHILLS OF THE BLACK MOUNTAINS. TWO OUTDOOR ACTIVITY CENTRES HAVE BEEN OPENED IN THE AREA, ONE FOR ESSEX COUNTY COUNCIL AND ONE A COMMERCIAL VENTURE. ANOTHER FARM IS THE BASE FOR A FLOURISHING PONY TREKKING CENTRE WITH A DRY SKI SLOPE, CARAVAN AND TENT SITE. THE PUBLIC HOUSE IN THE VILLAGE ATTRACTS BED AND BREAKFAST TRADE. BRIGHTLY COLOURED ANORAKS, RUCKSACKS AND LAND ROVERS ARE FAMILIAR SIGHTS AS ARE THE LINES OF PONY TREKKERS TRAVELLING TO AND FROM THE CENTRES.
